description:
We've just upgraded our test nova environment from grizzly -> havana and we are getting the following error when booting an instance.

This error happens when setting:

force_raw_images = True
use_cow_images = False

We are using the latest checkout from stable/havana (HEAD = f7cfc1cc6ba51617d02dd2b55419fad52a51793b)

title: Instances fail to spawn, e2label error when using raw

comments.content:
We've just upgraded our test nova environment from grizzly -> havana and we are getting the following error when booting an instance.

This error happens in our aggregate that uses qcow and our aggregate that uses raw.

We are using the latest checkout from stable/havana (HEAD = f7cfc1cc6ba51617d02dd2b55419fad52a51793b)


2013-11-21 14:42:17.225 1250 DEBUG nova.virt.disk.api [req-1b530b18-b502-4319-b099-7d7853f79fab d9646718471b46aeb5fd94c702336ca9 0bdf024c921848c4b74d9e69af9edf08] Checking if we can resize image /var/lib/nova/instances/bbda2f1d-e682-4300-b9a2-fde84e2e0453/disk. size=21474836480 can_resize_image /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/virt/disk/api.py:157

See bug 1253510
